summary: "Miami Vice" was a popular TV crime show in the 1980s. It starred Don Johnson and Philip Michael Thomas as undercover cops in Miami. The series was known for its cool style, using lots of 1980s music and trendy visuals. It ran for five seasons and was so unique that it even had a movie made about it in 2006. The show was a big hit and changed how TV crime dramas looked.
title: Miami Vice
